title: Detect Thoughts
content:
izard, Arcane Trickster, Eldritch Knight, The Great Old One, Circle of the Spores Detect Thoughts can be cast by using the following Items: Uncovered Mysteries

Bard, Sorcerer, Wizard, Arcane Trickster, Eldritch Knight, The Great Old One, Circle of the Spores

Uncovered Mysteries

Detect Thoughts Tips & Notes

Detect Thoughts is a ritual spell which can be cast without expending a spell slot outside combat. You will get the option to use it in conversations if the spell is prepared.

Lvl 2 Spell
